name: The Grand Chateau and Orangerie
description:
DESCRIPTION
In the heart of the upper valley of Chevreuse, very close to the activity centers of the region on and west of Paris, this exceptional atypical place will seduce you with its charm, its intimacy and the flexibility it offers. Between the Renaissance and the Middle Ages, surrounded by four towers and water moats, nestled in a listed park of 10 hectares, the Château will offer you a rare, refined and authentic setting. Its first secret: Its 414m2 orangery, which will accommodate your wedding reception.
Today, as in the past, the Château opens its doors to the wedding festivities and allows you to experience an intense day in joy and prestige. By privatizing the estate, located in the Haute Vallée de Chevreuse natural park, you will be celebrating your love in front of a most intimate historic castle. The building dating from the 16th century is surrounded by a charming wood, a bucolic setting for an exceptional reception in summer and winter. Welcomed in the all-glass Orangery of over 400 m2, this place invites you to sit around a delicious wedding meal that will bring together up to 300 people seated. Very close to the capital, the place offers you a break of serenity and a landscape of great beauty.
The Orangery:
The dimension of the orangery is 18 m wide by 23 m long. The reception area is practically square: 18m wide by 19m long.
There are several possible configurations of this fact, and in all cases, a space intended for the dance is preserved, the tables being distributed around this space. The seating plan is based on round tables of 10 people and a head table of 18 people.
The park can host your cocktail reception and ceremony, which faces the castle and the orangery. The orangery, a 414m2 glass structure in the Baltar pavilion style is available for an unforgettable evening.
In uncertain weather or in winter.
The cocktail can take place in a tent set up in the park, facing the castle. If there is a commitment ceremony, it takes place in the orangery (up to 190 people). During the cocktail party, the orangery is re-organized into a reception room.
The castle can provide a large part of the reception furniture. This is made up of:
250 Napoleon III Crystal Chairs white seated
15 Round tables 152 cm in diameter for 10 people, the rest to be rented
1 Head table 5 m long for 12 to 18 people
2 easels
1 8-seater garden furniture - 20 solid wood garden chairs.
Sound & light equipment:
The orangery is fully equipped with sound and light equipment. Everything is pre-installed and wired and the DJ only needs his computer to connect to the control equipment.
We also have a portable wireless speaker with microphone, USB compatible, jack port, to sound the cocktail in the garden for example.
To take full advantage of the technical potential offered by the installation (control of moving heads and projectors by the Sunlite Pro software), and to respect the castle's DJ charter, we recommend that you select a DJ from our team.
Orchestras can have 9 channels with XLR sockets.
Accommodation:
The Château has six beautiful rooms to accommodate 15 people (2 or 3 people per room). There are also two lovely guesthouses nearby for additional guests.
There are numerous accommodation options in the area, in guest rooms, hotels, residences which we can recommend.
Car park: The area offers very large green spaces to park more than 250 vehicles inside the enclosure. the parking areas, on grass, are designed for this purpose: site drainage, lighting. A valet is in charge of the arrival of guests from 150 people.
A dedicated Catering office/commercial kitchen, outdoor terrace and a refrigerated truck are also available.
If you would like further information then please do let me know and we will be more than happy to help and provide you with an accurate quote.
